article_title: A Surprising New Source of American Jobs: China
article_text:
The 2016 presidential-campaign season will bring all sorts of familiar proposals to create jobs in the U.S., but candidates who really understand today’s global economy should highlight a more surprising possible engine of new employment for Americans: China.

China’s middle class continues to grow, reaching an estimated 630 million people by 2022. Those consumers want better health care, world-class education and a cleaner...

twitter.description: Online services from the U.S. can meet growing Chinese demand for health care, education and a cleaner environment.
twitter.title: A Surprising New Source of American Jobs: China
